data.title: Why María Corina Machado was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize
data.text: María Corina Machado, the Venezuelan political opposition leader, has received the 2025 Nobel Peace Prize, the Norwegian Nobel Committee announced Friday. CBS News' Lilia Luciano explains why.
data.summary:
María Corina Machado, the Venezuelan political opposition leader, has received the 2025 Nobel Peace Prize, the Norwegian Nobel Committee announced Friday.
CBS News' Lilia Luciano explains why.
